alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 5:43PM MDT until May 27 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Weld County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 543 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Briggsdale, or 31 miles northeast of Greeley, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Keota around 600 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Grover. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
